codeboxarray.content:
sleep(1)
sample("brute_SD_01")
sleep(2)
sample("brute_SD_01",{send=0.5})
sleep(1)
loop()

for i=1,7 do
sample("TR808_CH",{amp=0.6})
sleep(0.25)
sample("TR808_CH",{amp=0.1})
sleep(0.25)
end
sample("TR808_OH",{amp=0.6,dur=0.1})
sleep(0.5)
loop()

for i=1,16 do
   play(C2,{dur=0.4,send=0.3,amp=0.3,mod=0.5,cutoff=math.random(200,2000),resonance=math.random(5,15)})
   sleep(0.5)
end
loop()
